expt_aim: How people perceive two very similar sentences
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
Some but not all of the weekends were sunny.
He thought the student was good.
Two of the shirts were striped.
The cookie was either chocolate or oatmeal.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
All of the weekends were sunny.
He thought the student was good but not excellent.
Two but not three of the shirts were striped.
The cookie was chocolate and oatmeal.
